name: AshBelt
description:
The AshBelt is untamed. A vast and ravaged flat-land once tendered by Gods... but such divine presence is no more. Anyone who dares to travel will be preyed upon by the wicked creatures that roam the dusty plain.

This build is WIP. It's a remake of the original Flash game made for 2021 Newgrounds Flash Forward Jam.
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/782748
